name: Dark theme new.rro.ch, epaper.walliserbote.ch etc.
description: Dark theme for new.rro.ch, epaper.walliserbote.ch, abo.walliserbote.ch and www.1815.ch A dark theme for the news app & services. Compatibility Tested on browsers: Firefox, Chrome, Edge, Opera Any issues, let me know and the theme will be updated ASAP - just ensure you are using the latest version at all times
additional_info:
Current version:
v3.1 - the main pages & all sub pages (new.rro.ch, epaper.walliserbote.ch & abo.walliserbote.ch) has received the dark mode 

v3.2 - the sub pages of www.1815.ch will receive the complete dark mode
v3.1 - the sub pages of epaper.walliserbote.ch has received the complete dark mode
v3.0 - the main page of epaper.walliserbote.ch has received the complete dark mode

v2.2 - a few improvements have been made - insert fields, submit fields etc.
v2.1 - the sub pages of abo.walliserbote.ch has received the complete dark mode
v2.0 - the main page of abo.walliserbote.ch has received the complete dark mode

v1.2 - the sub pages of new.rro.ch has received the complete dark mode
v1.1 - the main page of new.rro.ch has received the complete dark mode
v1.0 - the basic framework was copied from my other theme(s)
